00016         GET(HouseClass *, pThis, ECX);

00018         // cache all super weapon statuses
00019         struct SWStatus {
00020                 bool Available;
00021                 bool PowerSourced;
00022         };
00023         SWStatus *Statuses = new SWStatus[pThis->Supers.Count];
00024         for(int i = 0; i < pThis->Supers.Count; ++i) {
00025                 Statuses[i].Available = false;
00026                 Statuses[i].PowerSourced = false;
00027         }
00028 
00029         // look at every sane building this player owns, if it is not defeated already.
00030         if(!pThis->Defeated) {
00031                 for(int idxBld = 0; idxBld < pThis->Buildings.Count; ++idxBld) {
00032                         BuildingClass * pBld = pThis->Buildings.GetItem(idxBld);
00033                         if(pBld->IsAlive && !pBld->InLimbo) {
00034                                 TechnoExt::ExtData *pExt = TechnoExt::ExtMap.Find(pBld);
00035 
00036                                 // the super weapon status update lambda.
00037                                 auto UpdateStatus = [=](int idxSW) {
00038                                         if(idxSW > -1) {
00039                                                 Statuses[idxSW].Available = true;
00040                                                 if(!Statuses[idxSW].PowerSourced) {
00041                                                         Statuses[idxSW].PowerSourced = pBld->HasPower
00042                                                                 && pExt->IsOperated()
00043                                                                 && !pBld->IsUnderEMP();
00044                                                 }
00045                                         }
00046                                 };
00047 
00048                                 // check for upgrades. upgrades can give super weapons, too.
00049                                 for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00050                                         if(BuildingTypeClass *Upgrade = pBld->Upgrades[i]) {
00051                                                 UpdateStatus(Upgrade->SuperWeapon);
00052                                                 UpdateStatus(Upgrade->SuperWeapon2);
00053                                         }
00054                                 }
00055 
00056                                 // look for the main building.
00057                                 UpdateStatus(pBld->FirstActiveSWIdx());
00058                                 UpdateStatus(pBld->SecondActiveSWIdx());
00059                         }
00060                 }
00061         }
00062 
00063         // now update every super weapon that is valid.
00064         for(int idxSW = 0; idxSW < pThis->Supers.Count; ++idxSW) {
00065                 SuperClass *pSW = pThis->Supers[idxSW];
00066                 SuperWeaponTypeClass * pSWType = pSW->Type;
00067 
00068                 // if this weapon has not been granted there's no need to update
00069                 if(pSW->Granted) {
00070 
00071                         // is this a super weapon to be updated?
00072                         // sw is bound to a building and no single-shot => create goody otherwise
00073                         bool isCreateGoody = (!pSW->unknown_bool_60 || pSW->Quantity);
00074                         bool needsUpdate = !isCreateGoody || pThis->Defeated;
00075                         if(needsUpdate) {
00076 
00077                                 // super weapons of defeated players are removed.
00078                                 if(!pThis->Defeated) {
00079 
00080                                         // turn off super weapons that are disallowed.
00081                                         if(!Unsorted::SWAllowed) {
00082                                                 if(pSWType->DisableableFromShell) {
00083                                                         Statuses[idxSW].Available = false;
00084                                                 }
00085                                         }
00086 
00087                                         // there is at least one available and powered building,
00088                                         // but the house is generally on low power.
00089                                         if(pThis->PowerOutput < pThis->PowerDrain) {
00090                                                 Statuses[idxSW].PowerSourced = false;
00091                                         }
00092                                 } else {
00093                                         // remove. owner is defeated.
00094                                         Statuses[idxSW].Available = false;
00095                                 }
00096 
00097                                 // shut down or power up super weapon and decide whether
00098                                 // a sidebar tab update is needed.
00099                                 bool update = false;
00100                                 if(!Statuses[idxSW].Available || pThis->Defeated) {
00101                                         update = (pSW->Lose() && HouseClass::Player);
00102                                 } else if(!Statuses[idxSW].PowerSourced) {
00103                                         update = (pSW->IsPowered() && pSW->SetOnHold(true));
00104                                 } else {
00105                                         update = (Statuses[idxSW].PowerSourced && pSW->SetOnHold(false));
00106                                 }
00107 
00108                                 // update only if needed.
00109                                 if(update) {
00110                                         // only the human player can see the sidebar.
00111                                         if(pThis == HouseClass::Player) {
00112                                                 if(Unsorted::CurrentSWType == idxSW) {
00113                                                         Unsorted::CurrentSWType = -1;
00114                                                 }
00115                                                 int idxTab = SidebarClass::GetObjectTabIdx(SuperClass::AbsID, pSWType->GetArrayIndex(), 0);
00116                                                 MouseClass::Instance->RepaintSidebar(idxTab);
00117                                         }
00118                                         pThis->ShouldRecheckTechTree = true;
00119                                 }
00120                         }
00121                 }
00122         }
00123 
00124         // clean up.
00125         delete [] Statuses;

00127 
00128         return 0x50B1CA;
